com.omega.distributedsupport.coordinator
Class CoordinatorMsg

java.lang.Object
  com.omega.distributedsupport.coordinator.CoordinatorMsg
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoordinatorPing
public class CoordinatorMsg
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Object constituting message sent between coordinators via multicast.

CoordinatorMsg objects transmitted over the wire will be comprised into the following byte message structure:

  • Payload Size -> 2 byte short containing size of message payload.
  • Checksum -> 8 byte CRC-32 checksum of the payload.
  • Payload -> N bytes comprising a CoordinatorMsg object serialized via java.io.ObjectOutputStream.

Author:
Ross Bayer
See Also:

fromBytes

public static <T> T fromBytes(byte[] bytes,
                              long checksum)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Converts a Coordinator object in byte message form into a CoordinatorPing object. In addition to deserializing the byte array, this method also checks the data integrity via the checksum.

Parameters:
bytes - The byte array to convert.
checksum - The checksum receiving with the byte array.
Returns:
The deserialized CoordinatorPing object.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Thrown if the checksum does not match the provided array.
